question: how to search a bus
answer: Go to the Home page and choose one of the three options: (1) Enter 'From' and 'To' addresses to see the route on a map, (2) Search using the bus name for specific bookings, or (3) Enter the Bus ID to view its current location.

question: what are the different ways to search for a bus
answer: There are three ways to search for a bus: Search by Route (enter From and To addresses), Search by Bus Name (if you know the specific bus name), or Search by Bus ID (to track the bus in real-time).

question: how to search bus by route
answer: On the Home page, select 'Search by Route', enter your starting location in the 'From' field and your destination in the 'To' field. A map will display showing the route, and you can adjust your selected locations directly on the map.

question: how to search bus by name
answer: On the Home page, choose 'Search by Bus Name' and enter the specific name of the bus you want to book. This is useful when you already know which bus you need.

question: how to search bus by id
answer: On the Home page, select 'Search by Bus ID' and enter the Bus ID. This will show you the current real-time location of that specific bus on the map.

question: how to track a bus location
answer: You can track a bus location by using the 'Search by Bus ID' option on the Home page. Enter the Bus ID and the map will display the bus's current real-time location.

question: can i adjust my location on the map
answer: Yes, when you search by route and the map appears, you can adjust your selected 'From' and 'To' locations directly on the map interface.

question: how to use the map option
answer: Click on the 'Map' option in the navigation bar to view all nearby buses displayed on a map in real-time. This gives you a visual overview of buses in your vicinity.

question: what does the map section show
answer: The Map section displays a real-time view of all nearby buses in your area, helping you quickly track and locate buses around you.

question: how to view my tickets
answer: Navigate to the 'Ticket' section in the navigation bar. All tickets you have booked will be displayed there based on your booking history.

question: where can i see my booked tickets
answer: Go to the 'Ticket' section from the navigation bar to see all your booked tickets listed in order of your booking history.

question: how to book a bus ticket
answer: After selecting a bus through one of the search options, tap 'Book Now', fill in passenger details, and complete the payment using Razorpay.

question: what payment method is supported
answer: The website uses Razorpay as the payment gateway for booking bus tickets. You can complete your payment securely through Razorpay.

question: how to cancel a ticket
answer: Go to the 'My Tickets' section under your profile, select the ticket you wish to cancel, and tap the 'Cancel' button.

answer: Go to the 'Nearby' section, select a category such as Hospital, Clinic, or School. A map will show all nearby locations. Tap on any location to see a 'Go Here' button for directions.

question: how to get directions to a nearby place

question: what categories are available in nearby section
answer: The Nearby section includes categories such as Hospitals, Clinics, Schools, and other essential services to help you find important locations nearby.

question: why am i getting 'Please provide from and to coordinates' error
answer: This error occurs when you try to search for a bus by route but haven't provided complete location information. Make sure you enter both 'From' and 'To' addresses with valid latitude and longitude coordinates.

question: what does 'No direct or multi-hop bus route found' mean
answer: This means there is no available bus route between your selected locations. The system checked for both direct routes and routes with transfers but couldn't find any connection. Try selecting different locations or check if buses operate in your area.

question: why is it saying 'no device id i have'
answer: This error appears when you try to search for a bus by ID but haven't entered any Bus ID. Please enter a valid Bus ID in the search field to track the bus location.

question: what does 'no bus found' error mean
answer: This error occurs when the Bus ID you entered doesn't exist in the system. Double-check the Bus ID and make sure you've typed it correctly, or try searching by route or bus name instead.

question: why am i getting 'bus name is required' error
answer: This error appears when you try to search by bus name but haven't entered any name in the search field. Please type the name of the bus you're looking for.

question: what does 'All fields including time slots are required' mean
answer: This is a system error that occurs during bus registration. It means some required information is missing such as bus name, device ID, route details, ticket price, or time slots. This error is typically seen by bus operators, not passengers.

question: why does it say 'Login first'
answer: This error appears when you try to perform an action that requires authentication but you're not logged into your account. Please log in to continue using this feature.

question: what does 'Bus already registered' mean
answer: This error occurs when trying to register a bus with a device ID that already exists in the system. Each bus must have a unique device ID. This is an administrative error for bus operators.

question: why am i getting 'No bus created' error
answer: This error means there are currently no buses registered in the system. This is typically a temporary issue - please try again later or contact support if the problem persists.

question: what does 'Missing required parameters' mean when calculating ticket price
answer: This error occurs when trying to calculate ticket price but some information is missing. Make sure you've selected a bus, entered your starting location (From), and destination (To) with valid coordinates.

question: why does it say 'Bus not found' when booking
answer: This error means the bus you're trying to book doesn't exist in the system. The bus may have been removed or the Bus ID might be incorrect. Try searching for buses again or select a different bus.

question: what does 'Route not found or invalid' mean
answer: This error occurs when the selected bus doesn't have a valid route configured in the system. The bus route may not be set up properly. Try selecting a different bus or contact support.

question: why am i getting 'Missing payment fields' error
answer: This error appears when payment information is incomplete. Make sure all required payment details from Razorpay are properly submitted including order ID, payment ID, and signature.

question: what does 'Missing ticket data' error mean
answer: This error occurs when trying to complete a booking but ticket information is missing. This typically happens if there was an issue calculating the ticket price. Try starting the booking process again.

question: why does it say 'Unauthorized' during payment
answer: This error means you're not logged in or your session has expired. Please log in again to complete your ticket booking and payment.

question: what does 'User not found' mean
answer: This error occurs when the system cannot find your user account even though you're logged in. Try logging out and logging back in. If the problem persists, you may need to create a new account.

question: why am i getting 'Payment verification failed' message
answer: This error means the payment could not be verified with Razorpay. This could happen due to incorrect payment details, a failed transaction, or a security issue. Check your payment method and try again.

question: what does 'no ticket available' mean
answer: This error appears when you try to view your tickets but haven't booked any yet. Once you book a ticket, it will appear in the Ticket section.

question: why does it say 'Payment not found'
answer: This error occurs when trying to view a specific ticket but the ticket ID doesn't exist or is incorrect. Check your ticket ID or go to the Ticket section to see all your bookings.

question: what does 'all fields are required' mean during user creation
answer: This error appears when setting up your account but some required information is missing. Make sure you provide your full name, email address, and profile picture to complete registration.

answer: This error occurs when you try to submit a support query without typing any question. Please enter your question in the chat box before submitting.

answer: This error appears when trying to submit a bus review without providing all necessary information. Make sure you select a bus and provide ratings before submitting your review.

answer: This error occurs when you try to review a bus you've already reviewed. Each user can only submit one review per bus. If you want to change your review, you'll need to edit your existing review.

question: why am i getting 'rating must be between 1 and 5' error
answer: This error appears when you provide an invalid rating value. All ratings must be between 1 (lowest) and 5 (highest). Please adjust your ratings to be within this range.

question: what does 'Valid from and to coordinates are required' mean
answer: This error occurs when planning a journey but location coordinates are invalid or missing. Make sure you've properly selected both your starting point and destination on the map.

answer: This is a general error indicating something went wrong on the server side. It's usually temporary. Try refreshing the page, clearing your browser cache, or waiting a few minutes before trying again. If the problem persists, contact support.
